00018 // Desc: Derived part of Direct3D::Init()
00019 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00020 Result Direct3D9::InitDerived(const StartupSettings* settings)
00021 {
00022         this->isfullscreen = settings->isfullscreen;
00023 
00024         // Create Direct3D 9
00025         d3d9 = Direct3DCreate9(D3D_SDK_VERSION);
00026         if(!d3d9)
00027                 return ERR("Error creating Direct3d 9.\nThis may be due to the D3D header file version not matching the D3D runtime DLL version.");
00028 
00029         return R_OK;
00030 }

00036 Result Direct3D9::CreateOutputWindow(const OutputSettings* settings, int screenidx)

00048                 {

00056                 // Try using primary screen
00057                 displayadapter = D3DADAPTER_DEFAULT;
00058                 CHKRESULT(d3d9->GetAdapterDisplayMode(displayadapter, &d3ddm));
00059         /*}*/
00060 
00061         // Adjust size
00062         Size<DWORD> backbuffersize;
00063         if(isfullscreen)
00064                 backbuffersize = settings->backbuffersize;
00065         else
00066         {
00067                 RECT clientrect;
00068                 if(GetClientRect(settings->wnd, &clientrect))
00069                 {
00070                         backbuffersize.width = clientrect.right - clientrect.left;
00071                         backbuffersize.height = clientrect.bottom - clientrect.top;
00072                 }
00073         }
00074 
00075         OutputWindow9* newwnd;
00076         CHKALLOC(newwnd = new OutputWindow9());
00077         if(numwnds == 0 || isfullscreen)
00078         {
00079                 // First window or fullscreen mode
00080                 IFFAILED(newwnd->CreateDevice(d3d9, displayadapter, backbuffersize, settings->wnd, settings->enablemultisampling))
00081                 {
00082                         REMOVE(newwnd);
00083                         return rlt;
00084                 }
00085         }
00086         else
00087         {
00088                 // Windowed mode
00089                 IFFAILED(newwnd->AdoptDevice(d3d9, displayadapter, backbuffersize, settings->wnd, settings->enablemultisampling, wnds[0]))
00090                 {
00091                         REMOVE(newwnd);
00092                         return rlt;
00093                 }
00094         }
00095 
00096         CHKALLOC(wnds = (OutputWindow9**)realloc(wnds, (numwnds + 1) * sizeof(OutputWindow9*)));
00097         wnds[numwnds++] = newwnd;
00098 
00099         return R_OK;
00100 }

00106 void Direct3D9::ReleaseDerived()
00107 {
00108         for(int i = 0; i < numwnds; i++)
00109                 REMOVE(wnds[i])
00110         REMOVE_ARRAY(wnds)
00111         numwnds = 0;
